Detailed Description

Editor for editing a text in a vertical scrollable area.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

MultiLineEditor::MultiLineEditor (   ) 
 

If the default constructor is used, the parameters have to be provided by using the method Init.

INT  input_mapper_id,
const WCHAR *  text = 0
) 
 

Parameters:
parent Pointer to the parent-control.
input_mapper_id Id of Input-Mapper. The resulting instance of the Input-Mapper can be defined in EditConfig::CreateInputMapper().
text Pointer to text, which will be copied to the internal buffer.

const Font & MultiLineEditor::GetFont (   )  const
 

Returns the font of the text-editor document.

See also:
TextEditorDocument::SetFont

TextEditorDocument::GetFont

INT MultiLineEditor::GetMaxTextLength (   )  const
 

Returns:
The maximum text length ( is not counted). If -1 is returned, no maximum text length is given and only restricted by the available memory.

const WString & MultiLineEditor::GetText (   )  const
 

Returns:
Reference to a WString, which represents the text of the internal buffer.

text Pointer to text, which will be copied to the internal buffer.

void MultiLineEditor::SetFont (  const Font &  font  ) 
 

Sets the font of the text-editor document. Per default the font defined by Font::TextEditor is used.

See also:
TextEditorDocument::SetFont

TextEditorDocument::GetFont

void MultiLineEditor::SetLineHeight (  XYDIM  line_height  ) 
 

Sets the line-height of the text-editor document.

See also:
TextEditorDocument::SetLineHeight

TextEditorDocument::GetLineHeight

void MultiLineEditor::SetMaxTextLength (  INT  max_tex_len  ) 
 

Sets the maximum text length ( is not counted). If a value < 0 is used, no maximum text length is given and hence only restricted by the available memory.

BOOLEAN MultiLineEditor::SetProperty (  ResourceParser &  parser,
const GuiObjectFactory::PropertyId  prop_id
) 
 

Initializes the instance by reading out a resource file generated by ARAGON. This method may not be invoked by the MMI in a direct manner and might be changed in future releases.

Reimplemented from AbstractMultiLineEditor.
